1.0.2.en: Removed CS translations for certification, changes in API calls

1.1.0.en: New capability - daily average price, new trigger - price for x hours is highest/lowest for the day

1.0.5.en: new trigger - when api fails, widgets for testing

1.0.7.en: fixed device values when api fails, fixed error trigger

1.2.0.en: Fixed new WHEN and AND cards, removed extra development log

1.2.7.en: Minor fixes thx to Michal Stranik

1.2.8.en: Fixed timezone issue on current price, added new flow cards

1.2.9.en: fixed today price widget with negative prices

1.2.11.en: Users now can set how many hour are in high/low price index.

1.2.12.en: Changes in today spot price widget

1.2.13.en: Updated today price widget - more compact, highlighted current hour bar, color scheme is now based on high/low price index settings in device settings
